Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to adding a surcharge on online delivery transactions within the city of New York
Summary: Adds a three dollar surcharge on online delivery transactions terminating within the city of New York to be used to fund the operating costs of buses and subways in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to adding a surcharge on online delivery transactions within the city of New York
